sentences.en: An encroachment of the forgotten things is a special crime.
sentences.cn: 侵占遗忘物是侵占罪的特殊类型.

sentences.en: Encroachment on any enterprise run by the national bourgeoisie is strictly prohibited.
sentences.cn: 一切民族资产阶级经营的企业,严禁侵犯.

sentences.en: In Ming dynasty , the external encroachment on the frontier was very serious.
sentences.cn: 明朝时, 边患十分严重.

sentences.en: It must be defended against encroachment or assault from any quarter, public or private.
sentences.cn: 必须保护新闻自由不受来自任何公共或私人集团的侵蚀与破坏.

sentences.en: It's a sign of the encroachment of commercialism in medicine.
sentences.cn: 这是营利主义入侵医学界的一种迹象。

sentences.en: The eagle broke away and defiantly continued its encroachment.
sentences.cn: 此时雕挣脱开对方,继续强行入侵.

sentences.en: The problem was to safeguard sites from encroachment by property development.
sentences.cn: 问题是要保护遗址免受房地产开发商的侵占。

sentences.en: We are likely to take stronger action to prevent and prohibit encroachment of our patent rights.
sentences.cn: 我们可能采取强硬的手段以阻止对我们的侵权行为.

sentences.en: We can prevent encroachment on public interest effectively only by depending on citizen and social organization.
sentences.cn: 只有发挥民众和社团组织的力量,才能有效防止侵害公共利益的行为.

trans.tran_en: You can describe the action or process of encroaching on something as encroachment
